original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 291.00/292.50 to dollar, bond yields steady at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka spot US dollar opened at 291.00/292.50 rupees and the bonds were steady on Thursday, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 291.00/292.00 rupees rupees on Wednesday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 23.00/30 percent down from 23.10/40 percent a day earlier, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 26.25/75. percent, steady from 26.25/60 percent on Wednesday.
